properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 27 at 3:33AM CST until January 28 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7
inches possible.

* WHERE...In Oklahoma, Beaver County. In Texas, Ochiltree and
Lipscomb Counties.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight through noon Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will likely begin as rain. A
wet snow will become more likely late tonight. North winds of 15
to 25 MPH may cause areas of blowing snow and will cause wind
chill values to fall into the 15 to 20 degree range.
properties.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING FOR THE EASTERN OKLAHOMA PANHANDLE AND THE NORTHEAST TEXAS PANHANDLE
